An Evening with the Community

An Evening with the Community

:

You've got to love the local tech community. We all come together just to play and share experiences in organizes events. What have we learned so far:

  • Planning
  • Venues and Sponsorships
  • Speakers

How do you plan for an event? It takes a bit of time. Some orga plan for the whole year to get sponsors early on. Others plan when we ask users - what do you want to learn?

Aside from our friends from Globe Labs, what other venues are there? We had some feedback on a number of different vanues. Alvin seems to know who to contaclt.

PWDO has generally tried to do a cold email. Some other orgs are able to get speakers by getting them a share of the ticket sales.
